_header: Mine angel that art to me I-sent
Note: This is the concluding stanza of 2862.
_description: A prayer to the Guardian Angel — one quatrain

DurCathA425.Transcription:
Myn angel that art to me ysendffro god to be my gouernourffro
                    alle yvyl thu me defendIn euery dyssese be my socour
